thread.title: Bella Hadid Had Another Awkward Run-In With The Weeknd, Handled It Like a Pro Thanks to Sister Gigi -- Watch!
thread.title_full: Bella Hadid Had Another Awkward Run-In With The Weeknd, Handled It Like a Pro Thanks to Sister Gigi -- Watch!

author: Desiree Murphy
title: Bella Hadid Had Another Awkward Run-In With The Weeknd, Handled It Like a Pro Thanks to Sister Gigi -- Watch!
text: Bella Hadid Had Another Awkward Run-In With The Weeknd, Handled It Like a Pro Thanks to Sister Gigi -- Watch! by Desiree Murphy 4:50   Photo: Getty Images Bella Hadid is pretty much a pro at handling awkward run-ins with her ex. The 20-year-old model strutted her stuff on the catwalk during H&M's runway show in Paris, France, on Thursday, as her former beau, The Weeknd, performed. Luckily, her older sister, Gigi Hadid, was by her side to help her get through the uncomfortable situation. WATCH: Bella Hadid Opens Up About Break Up With The Weeknd, Experiencing Heartache A fan caught the exact moment when Bella walked past The Weeknd on camera, and we have to admit, it's pretty epic. Not only is the song The Weeknd is singing, "Nothing Without You," quite fitting -- with lyrics like "I realized I belong to you, I feel the darkness when I'm away from you," and "Don't stop your lovin', walk out on me" -- but the way the sisters SLAY their walk so as to say, "See what you're missing?" is remarkable. Watch below: A post shared by Nikki Ogunnaike (@nikkiogun) on Mar 1, 2017 at 1:09pm PST It's almost as good as that time Bella walked past him during the Victoria's Secret Fashion Showâ€¦
